org.apache.flink.runtime.concurrent

类 FutureUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.concurrent.FutureUtils

  • public class FutureUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utilities that expand the usage of CompletableFuture.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  FutureUtils.ConjunctFuture<T>
      A future that is complete once multiple other futures completed.
      private static class  FutureUtils.Delayer
      Delay scheduler used to timeout futures.
      private static class  FutureUtils.ResultConjunctFuture<T>
      The implementation of the FutureUtils.ConjunctFuture which returns its Futures' result as a collection.
      static class  FutureUtils.RetryException
      Exception with which the returned future is completed if the retry(Supplier, int, Executor) operation fails.
      private static class  FutureUtils.Timeout
      Runnable to complete the given future with a TimeoutException.
      private static class  FutureUtils.WaitingConjunctFuture
      Implementation of the FutureUtils.ConjunctFuture interface which waits only for the completion of its futures and does not return their values.

      FutureUtils()

    • 方法详细资料

      • retry

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> retry(java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>> operation,
                                                                  int retries,
                                                                  java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Retry the given operation the given number of times in case of a failure.
        类型参数:
        T - type of the result
        参数:
        operation - to executed
        retries - if the operation failed
        executor - to use to run the futures
        返回:
        Future containing either the result of the operation or a FutureUtils.RetryException

      • retryOperation

        private static <T> void retryOperation(java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> resultFuture,
                                       java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>> operation,
                                       int retries,
                                       java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Helper method which retries the provided operation in case of a failure.
        类型参数:
        T - type of the future's result
        参数:
        resultFuture - to complete
        operation - to retry
        retries - until giving up
        executor - to run the futures

      • retryWithDelay

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> retryWithDelay(java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>> operation,
                                                                           int retries,
                                                                           Time retryDelay,
                                                                           ScheduledExecutor scheduledExecutor)
        Retry the given operation with the given delay in between failures.
        类型参数:
        T - type of the result
        参数:
        operation - to retry
        retries - number of retries
        retryDelay - delay between retries
        scheduledExecutor - executor to be used for the retry operation
        返回:
        Future which retries the given operation a given amount of times and delays the retry in case of failures

      • retryOperationWithDelay

        private static <T> void retryOperationWithDelay(java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> resultFuture,
                                                java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T>> operation,
                                                int retries,
                                                Time retryDelay,
                                                ScheduledExecutor scheduledExecutor)

      • combineAll

        public static <T> FutureUtils.ConjunctFuture<java.util.Collection<T>> combineAll(java.util.Collection<? extends java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<? extends T>> futures)
        Creates a future that is complete once multiple other futures completed. The future fails (completes exceptionally) once one of the futures in the conjunction fails. Upon successful completion, the future returns the collection of the futures' results.

        The ConjunctFuture gives access to how many Futures in the conjunction have already completed successfully, via FutureUtils.ConjunctFuture.getNumFuturesCompleted().

        参数:
        futures - The futures that make up the conjunction. No null entries are allowed.
        返回:
        The ConjunctFuture that completes once all given futures are complete (or one fails).

      • waitForAll

        public static FutureUtils.ConjunctFuture<java.lang.Void> waitForAll(java.util.Collection<? extends java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<?>> futures)
        Creates a future that is complete once all of the given futures have completed. The future fails (completes exceptionally) once one of the given futures fails.

        The ConjunctFuture gives access to how many Futures have already completed successfully, via FutureUtils.ConjunctFuture.getNumFuturesCompleted().

        参数:
        futures - The futures to wait on. No null entries are allowed.
        返回:
        The WaitingFuture that completes once all given futures are complete (or one fails).

      • completedExceptionally

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> completedExceptionally(java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Returns an exceptionally completed CompletableFuture.
        类型参数:
        T - type of the future
        参数:
        cause - to complete the future with
        返回:
        An exceptionally completed CompletableFuture

      • toFiniteDuration

        public static scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration toFiniteDuration(Time time)
        Converts Flink time into a FiniteDuration.
        参数:
        time - to convert into a FiniteDuration
        返回:
        FiniteDuration with the length of the given time

        Converts FiniteDuration into Flink time.
        参数:
        finiteDuration - to convert into Flink time
        返回:
        Flink time with the length of the given finite duration

      • toJava

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> toJava(scala.concurrent.Future<T> scalaFuture)
        Converts a Scala Future to a CompletableFuture.
        类型参数:
        T - type of the future value
        参数:
        scalaFuture - to convert to a Java 8 CompletableFuture
        返回:
        Java 8 CompletableFuture

      • orTimeout

        public static <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> orTimeout(java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> future,
                                                                      long timeout,
                                                                      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Times the given future out after the timeout.
        类型参数:
        T - type of the given future
        参数:
        future - to time out
        timeout - after which the given future is timed out
        timeUnit - time unit of the timeout
        返回:
        The timeout enriched future
